main.head: Pizza Break
main.p: Tomas Kral is a Czech artist who worked for four years at the UPP company as a senior team leader on feature films such as 2012, RedTails, Season of the Witch, Pandorum, Salt, and others. These days, he works as CG artist / VFX artist for R.U.R. Postproduction and freelances for other clients.
